summary: An immigrant father decides to take his truant son back to the old country.
cast: Aqib Khan|Om Puri|Linda Bassett|Robert Pugh|Thomas Russell|Lesley Nicol|Jimi Mistry|Vanessa Hehir|John Branwell|Yograj Singh|Vijay Raaz|Karamjit Anmol|Sanjeev Attri|Raj Bhansali|Dhanalaxmi Padmakumar|Sheeba Chaddha|Ila Arun|Emil Marwa|Nadim Sawalha|Kamal Arora|Sunil Soni|Kalra Chander|Zita Sattar|Sujata Kumar|Enid Dunn
title: Occidente es occidente
